ResearchProjectDef.label: German Firearms Tier I
ResearchProjectDef.description: The possibility of producing simple German firearms from World War II such as Karabiner 98k, MG 08, Mauser C96 or Luger P08.

ResearchProjectDef.label: German Firearms Tier II
ResearchProjectDef.description: The possibility of producing advanced German firearms from World War II such as MP40, MG 34, or Gewehr 41.

ResearchProjectDef.label: German Firearms Tier III
ResearchProjectDef.description: The ability to produce modern German firearms from World War II such as the STG 44, Gewehr 43, FG 42 or MG 42.

ResearchProjectDef.label: German Explosives Tier I
ResearchProjectDef.description: The possibility of producing simple German Anti-tank weapons from World War II such as M1924 Stielhandgranate, Blendkörper 1H, Granatbüchse 39 and Panzerbüchse 39.

ResearchProjectDef.label: German Explosives Tier II
ResearchProjectDef.description: The possibility of producing advanced German Anti-tank weapons from World War II such as M1939 Eiergranate, Blendkörper 2H, Panzerfaust 30 and Panzerfaust 60.

ResearchProjectDef.label: German Explosives Tier III
ResearchProjectDef.description: The possibility of producing modern German Anti-tank weapons from World War II such M1943 Stielhandgranate, Hafthohlladung and Raketenpanzerbüchse 54.
